sequence.notes: Synthesis of Ascaridole from 1-isopropyl-4-methylcyclohexa-1,4-diene (commonly known as α-terpinene) via photooxidation. Note: The reactant is labeled 'α-Terpineol' in the image, but the drawn structure corresponds to 1-isopropyl-4-methylcyclohexa-1,4-diene (α-terpinene), which is a common precursor for Ascaridole.
